executable.title: ComputeFissureFeatureVectors
executable.description: This program generates a collection of feature vectors at point locations \ indicated by an input polydata file.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and women's hospital

image.name: ctFileName
image.label: Input CT file name
image.description: Input CT file to be enhanced.

string.name: vesselParticlesFileName
string.label: Vessel particles file name
string.description: Vessel particles to use for the enhancement.

string.name: pointsParticlesFileName
string.label: Points particles file name
string.description: Particles file indicating at what locations to compute the feature vectors.

string.name: rightShapeModelFileName
string.label: Right shape model file name
string.description: Right lung lobe boundaries shape model file name. The mean points of the shape model will \ be used to create thin plate spline surfaces. These surfaces will be used to compute certain features. A right \ shape model file OR a left shape model file (but not both) must be specified.

string.name: leftShapeModelFileName
string.label: Left shape model file name
string.description: Left lung lobe boundaries shape model file name. The mean points of the shape model will \ be used to create a thin plate spline surface. This surface will be used to compute certain features. A right \ shape model file OR a left shape model file (but not both) must be specified.

string.name: outFileName
string.label: Output file name (csv format)
string.description: Comma-separated value (csv) file that will contain the feature vectors \ for each point location indicated by the input polydata file.
